attributes.action: Review current taxation and policy and be crystal clear about where the money is going
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tax rise after tax rise is crippling every person in Britain.  The family man is losing out as he pays for pensioners to have cheaper fuel and travel the country on buses and pays for the benefits of all the people who are unable to find work.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
